roleset.name: high in price

role.descr: buyer, whom it is expensive to

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. Comparison to "cost".

example.name: Vague example
example.text: It would be expensive , and there would be consequences .

example.name: With concatenation
example.text: The car is very expensive to repair.

example.name: All args
example.text: Even at $300, it's expensive for me.
